Text: When you first download the software it is in Russian I think, but you can quite easily by icons navigate to the correct menu for changing the language. For instance Dutch and English are also available. In the standard install the western European maps are NOT included! If you use the 'Aura downloader' which is autmatically installed if you install this torrent on your Android, you can download the maps for other European countries. When I did this however, Aura did not start anymore.

Oh, after downloading the maps you just need to restart the device or clear the ram memory and it works! excellent!!

I am very happy with this download thank you very much.

Samsung galaxy S

Working flawless! Very easy to install. The only problem is that it starts up in Russia when installed. It is possible to download ALL the maps you want from Sygic. I am VERY satisfied. THANKS. I have installed on HTC Desire.
